name: KeyVision
tag_list: Open-Source, Software, Mobile, Web-2.0, Mobile-2.0, SyncML, Java, System-Integration, Document-Management, VoIP
overview:
KeyVision is a software company which distributes, integrates, manages and supports IT solutions with a declared preference for the Open Source products. KeyVision provides integration, configuration, testing, and continuous management of open source solutions reducing the cost and complexity associated with them.

Key Vision is a company founded by IT people to satisfy other IT people’s needs.

We counts on the best available IT experts who share a wide experience of many areas such as:

* Web development
* VoIP
* Customer Relationship Management
* Web Content Management
* Document Management
* SyncML and Mobile applications development

What is the difference between KeyVision and any other IT partner?

We walk with you through all the project cycle, from the analysis to the testing with the best experienced IT people. We are not just Open Source users, we want to be Open Source contributors because when you work with a solution you know how to improve it.
